name: Monstera Deliciosa
description: A popular houseplant known for its large, glossy leaves.

name: Philodendron Brasil
description: A low-maintenance plant with heart-shaped leaves.

name: Bird of Paradise
description: Comes in various colours, what makes it unique is it's bird beak shaped flowers.
